summary: The customer was looking for more information about Contoso Wireless' other product. The agent provided details on the features, including voice and video calling, instant messaging, group chat, file sharing, and secure encryption. The customer was also informed that a free 30-day trial is available and that there are various payment options after the trial period is over. The agent also provided information on customer support and discounts available on the other product. The customer was satisfied with the information provided and is now ready to give the product a try.
